descriptionHtml:
Readme
fits to cailientes body type

working body slider
took me forever to make this set., wont update or improve it, it made me half crazy so im moving on with other stuff.
if u like it , please endorse, endorsing is only a modders credit for good work.

installation, just extract the bsa into the data folder,esp file into same folder


issues,, the cape didt got quit right, when i was done with everything i saw i shouldt have made the mesh 2 layers -.- this cause abit of clipping.,cape change, remade it with cloth modifier in max.
and its seperate addon now, not a forced one

and prolly some more clipping on 1(full weight) version.

take it as it is or dont download

location

as usual solitude blackforge on the table outside, 2 variants beige and classic nexusblue color,cape and armor ^^
can be forged, prolly under the misc section in the menu, dwarwen perks ofc^^

theru
author: theru
